channel.title: AudioScape (vBulletin Forums) - Looking for Scripters
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://www.banner-generator.net/en/buildtmp/c30f9de99695bd9df5face6d1a66221e.png[/img] We will use DeltaScape source and remake that. Our aim is to have good pking. [B][U]How i came to idea to make AudioScape?[/U][/B] I have been played in runescape private servers for like year in total. And now i came to idea to make my own server. But the thing is my scripting is bad so i offer you to join me.
[B][U]Then what i do when i dont know how to script servers?[/U][/B] I have 3 year experience in websites. I know all codes what need for websites. So i make professional website for a server and advertise the server.
[B][U]People i need to help to create the server[/U][/B] 3xScripters 1xDesigners 2xDevelopers
[B][U]So we host a server ,how we will earn that money back?[/U][/B] We give people chance to donate to us with a little rewards. There will be ads on forum and website and that money will go to server money balance.
My msn is : [email]mart661@hotmail.com[/email] So when you would like to join the team just pm me or add me on MSN.[/CENTER]
In team: Audio - Scripter ,webmaster Souls - Developer ,assistant [u]All helpers will be Founders.
New!
There will come a Browser based Maffia game to website. [u][b] Want to join the team?[/b][/u] [b]Age: Role: Experience: How much time do you plan to devote to this: Why you want to join our team?:[/b]

item.title: AudioScape (vBulletin Forums) - Looking for Scripters
item.dc:creator: @audioscape audioscape
item.description:
@audioscape wrote:

[CENTER]
We will use DeltaScape source and remake that.
Our aim is to have good pking.
How i came to idea to make AudioScape?
I have been played in runescape private servers for like year in total. And now i came to idea to make my own server. But the thing is my scripting is bad so i offer you to join me.

Then what i do when i dont know how to script servers?
I have 3 year experience in websites. I know all codes what need for websites.
So i make professional website for a server and advertise the server.

People i need to help to create the server
3xScripters
1xDesigners
2xDevelopers

So we host a server ,how we will earn that money back?
We give people chance to donate to us with a little rewards.
There will be ads on forum and website and that money will go to server money balance.

My msn is : mart661@hotmail.com
So when you would like to join the team just pm me or add me on MSN.[/CENTER]

In team:
Audio - Scripter ,webmaster
Souls - Developer ,assistant
[u]All helpers will be Founders.

New!

There will come a Browser based Maffia game to website.

Want to join the team?
